#hahawithvtsl accidentally finding your way into orchestra auditions rather than the chess competition

First impression pepper? That's new. @BacheloretteABC #TheBachelorette https://t.co/u0kF7BfD59
@creativebcs @bcbusiness I did actually! It brought me here. Now to keep exploring.
@OpenRoadCA #TagForAJag16 Getting really comfortable with the f-type in preparation for my weekend :) https://t.co/zo5hFTf9CF

At the auto show #AcuraNSXinVan https://t.co/WBVHzg8UDO
Vote for me so I can win a trip to England to drive a @Porsche 718 Boxster at @SilverstoneUK https://t.co/ipPqXmKyjs
It'd be worth @TransLink to do a marketing blitz on how trains aren't garbage cans. This morning: newspapers, nail clippings, coffee cups...
@IanCallum @mph51 @JaguarPics Definitely looks like a 550 spider. Short door opening slightly upwards and narrow little windshield.
@LandRoverCanada Hibernate? I don't think so. #HIBERNOT https://t.co/iHQXx3KpXY
@fayemccreedy yeah we did too! Fell asleep on the couch, then "wha?"
Hibernate? I don't think so. #hibernot https://t.co/aj00iRBe7B
.@phillipsbeer First day of my advent calendar is delicious! Kudos for the Christmas vacation ref. I'm excited for the rest!
@OpenRoadCA I almost tried that with mine...until my wife saw where we're heading. When does it open? December?
@fayemccreedy @NEWS1130 @deltapolice Yeah, it's about time they even started paying attention to it.
@TransLink Thanks. I'm guessing Skytrain hasn't talked to the paper people yet as they're still blocking the entrance.
@TransLink Can you ask 24hrs guy to move from blocking 2 of 4 compass gates at King G stn? East entrnce. Didn't listen to me #obstaclecourse
Who needs a 4x4 when you have a @KiaCanada Rio? #hatchbacksruletheworld http://t.co/HXDSlMVvTI
.@TransLink Free transit doesn't help when I have a monthly pass.
I got to work earlier than usual by driving since @TransLink is down. Does the "free travel" pay for gas and parking? Thanks for the perks!
@christyclarkbc "By moving foreign owners out of the market housing prices will drop." That's the whole point.
@SunChips are the plain flavour sun chips still available anywhere? I haven't seen them in years and still regard them as my favourite chip.
@Starbucks There is nothing like a complimentary coffee on a beautiful Whistler morning! Thank you for the reward! http://t.co/h1lVWvtFx3
@OpenRoadCA Thanks for the coffee! I hope Cars and Coffee becomes a regular event! http://t.co/ripJPbrO5d
@HellyHansen My weekend adventure vehicle complete with Jolly Roger. #TakeFlightFriday http://t.co/WROAUteI5l
@JaguarCanada Are these going to be at the @VanAutoShow? #pleasesayyes
@VanAutoShow Will we be seeing the Ford GT, AMG GT, Mini Superlegarra Vision, Acura NSX, Jaguar Project 7 in Vancouver? All drool worthy.
@Starbucks I think the barista really liked me! Look at all those hearts! :D http://t.co/zIkRzzTjjI
@replyall you guys should send me your mystery box b/c I'm in Canada and we are behind the times here and can't use http://t.co/AqWNA7kf74
@LUVBBW My wife tried a Fresh Balsam wallflower plugin and all of the oil is in our wood floor now. Any thoughts on how to get it back out?
@LandRoverCanada Range Rover Evoque! I have one and love it!
@TransLink Ok, no need to be sorry. Just curious.
@TransLink Any idea why there is often a delay in opening the doors at Stadium when going westbound? Sometimes 5 seconds, sometimes 30.
RT to enter to win tickets to @BalletBCâ€™s #No29 from @Miss604 http://t.co/moJJ7qSR3O
@PorscheVancity well if you're offering...I'll just drop by my parents house, then Whistler, for long way to Kelowna. And pick up groceries.
@McD_Canada here's my cuppa joe. #mccafeathome http://t.co/erYbonZr08
@AudiCanada aw nuts. I use a wicked jacket. #ConquerTheCity
@AudiCanada my @HellyHansen jacket keeps me very warm and dry once I step out into the elements. And an umbrella would solve the hood hair!
@AudiCanada I suspect an R8 or an RS5 would help me save time. Until then, speed walking does. #ConquerTheCity
@SYSKPodcast @boyfmoz it isn't even available in Canada :( One day...
@AudiCanada One cup of coffee is usually nowhere near enough. One refillable mug is though :) #ConquerTheCity
Had a healthy dose of @porsche today with @PorscheVancity at Crescent Beach. Thanks for the ride! http://t.co/4V1YzzYUzW
@HTropic_CA ...she like the old stuff without sparkles.
@HTropic_CA BananaBoat is owned by same company as HTropic, do they use the same formula? My wife really liked the stuff without sparkles.
@HTropic_CA we tried that one this weekend :) No sparkles all over the boat and gear (yay!), but being thicker it didn't spread as easily...
@HTropic_CA #HTSummerBucketList Tubing and wakeboarding at the lake last weekend, nothing better. http://t.co/6l9KuMjPXV
@HTropic_CA what's the deal with the glitter in the sunscreen? I have trouble using it and feeling manly.
@TransLink 9am beer drinking and stashing the can under the seat acceptable these days? I guess it is a warm day... http://t.co/pXJI4RE9No
@PorscheVancity Help me win 3 days with the new @Porsche Targa. Vote for one of my photos every day until April 30: http://t.co/2vMP6Dx4fz
Help me win a new camera and 3 days with the new @Porsche Targa. Vote for one of my photos every day until April 30. http://t.co/2vMP6Dx4fz
@SYSKPodcast You guys totally got me. Ben is so good on Car Stuff, but then as he brought sysk down...I slowly caught on. Well done. Arghh
@thriftycars Thanks for the response and info.
My wife is at Toronto Airport and finding @thriftycars doesn't use winter tires. How ridiculous is that? Telephone agent said they did...
@SoftMocShoes Your Guilford store is not the place to be today. Long wait, saw the manager dismiss a customer away, and no gift receipts.
@PorscheVancity I saw a beautiful early 911 outside your building this morning as I passed on the train. Is that for sale? #oneofmydreamcars
@PrimetimeEmmys Who is hosting the Creative Arts Emmys? No where can I find the info or find whether its the same host as Primetime show.
@Shawhelp I skipped to Step 8 and called Shaw. The really long menu system ended up telling me Shaw knows there is a problem in my area.
@Shawhelp @VicFreelance I'm having issues in Surrey also. Internet and cable have been our for almost an hour.
@PorscheVancity If you need an extra driver when you move all your cars to Terminal Ave, I'd be happy to help out :)
@elonmusk @TeslaMotors Just saw my third Model S around Vancouver, BC. The air is smelling better already!
@diveidc your website isnt working and hasn't been for a while, are you guys still around?
@mmscanada I just had an m&m with no chocolate in it! Gasp! It was so unfulfilling. One side of the shell concave against the other side :(
@Talesofabryce @pre_planner oh I won't. I'll think of some more things to ponder where he'll question my level drug intake
@elonmusk youve bred giant birds and figured out how to mechanize them!
@elonmusk Do they hinge in the top and middle of the door? Like a gullwing but they fold in half!
@CFAinvestored and you completely left out the Tesla Roadster that they've had on the market for a couple years. Otherwise, good article.
@CFAinvestored Tsla article is a little off. Comparing the Leaf to the Model S is like a Civic to a Mercedes. And EV1 was unrelated to Volt
If rain were fire instead of water, what do you think umbrellas and coats would be made of? Or would we just evolve? #thoughtprovoking
@virgin953 I vote for not playing snippets of that bad Friday song by Rebecca black any more. I've had it in my head since 7:45!
@bchydro Hey, your mobile site doesn't let me get to the full site. There's a button for full site but it refreshes the mobile on iPhone.
A good motivating article to do what you need to do instead of sitting back comfortably. http://t.co/VGBo6AaW
